title: My google pixel will not stay switched on. "Google" logo comes up then switches off again.
content: I have held the power button to try and switch my phone on but the "Google" logo will come up and it just turns off again. I have tried holding the power and volume-down button together and selecting "power off" but when i switch it on it just turns off again. I have also tried selecting restart bootloader and that makes no difference either. Please help.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
